body:
Form Builder works by representing all of the elements in the service as data written in JSON (Javascript Object Notation).

This means you use JSON to define:

* your overall service
* each page within the service
* each component and item within each page (such as a radio button or text box)

You store your JSON files in a repository (for example, on [GitHub](https://github.com/)).

[Find out more about using JSON in Form Builder in the technical documentation](https://fbdocs.herokuapp.com/glossary/#json-and-json-schema).
heading: How Form Builder defines services
